import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: ''}) const contactData = { phone: '+2347037575894', email: 'onomesalomi@gmail.com', location: '3 Ismaila Bello Street, Koya Estate, Igbolomu, Ikorodu.' }; return (
Phone
{contactData.phone}
Email Address
{contactData.email}
Location
{contactData.location}
); } export default Contact;
